translation:
Most Illustrious and Most Excellent Sir

The citizen Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu, through his undersigned attorney, states that it is indispensable to register with the Treasury the amount that, according to the attached documents, the State owes him, in order that Your Excellency may grant what is requested.

Attorney: Domingos José de Almeida Bagé, March 17, 1842.

Power of attorney attached. Session of the Treasury Court in Bagé, March 17, 1842. Fontoura.

In the originals, there is a second copy.
